# Nuri ぬり — Web Development Studio

> We paint the web with purpose.

Nuri is a premium web development studio crafting beautiful, high-performance, and custom-designed websites for businesses that demand excellence. The name "Nuri" comes from the Japanese word for *paint* (ぬり), reflecting the studio's philosophy: every website is a canvas. Nuri blends artistry with meticulous engineering to build sites that are as beautiful as they are powerful.

## Core Services
*   **Custom Design:** Bespoke visual identities and interfaces tailored to the client's brand. No templates.
*   **Web Development:** Clean, modern code built for speed, accessibility, and long-term maintainability.
*   **Responsive & Mobile:** Pixel-perfect experiences across all devices.
*   **Hosting & Deployment:** Fast, reliable hosting setup with continuous deployment.
*   **SEO Optimisation:** Built-in best practices for maximum search engine visibility.
*   **Ongoing Support:** Technical support, monthly content updates, and 24/7 uptime monitoring.

## Pricing Structure
*   **Design & Build:** Starts at $50 (one-time fee). Includes custom design, development, SEO, domain configuration, and launch support.
*   **Care & Hosting:** Starts at $5/month. Includes secure hosting, continuous updates, technical support, and uptime monitoring.

## Target Audience
Nuri partners with businesses that want a standout digital presence, ranging from local restaurants and cafes to boutique shops and e-commerce platforms. 

## Portfolio Highlights
*   **Castaways Cafe:** A vibrant, full-featured website for a local cafe. Built with React and Vite. (Restaurant workflow)
*   **Katie Cakes:** A warm, elegant website for a boutique cake studio. Built with HTML & CSS. (Bakery workflow)
*   **Warren Cafe & Brunch:** A premium bilingual website for a Buenos Aires brunch café.
*   **Margaliti Collection:** A premium bilingual website for Tbilisi's boutique Cheese Bar.
*   **Mao Bubble Tea:** A super cute, fun, and funky website with playful animations for Tbilisi's premier bubble tea shop.
*   **Hiragana.site / Katakana.site:** Interactive, progressive web apps (PWAs) with offline support for practicing Japanese character writing. Built with Firebase. (Educational tools)

## Mission Statement
"From local restaurants to growing businesses, we deliver bespoke web solutions with meticulous attention to detail, fast load times, and designs that convert visitors into customers."

## Contact Information
*   **Website:** https://nurihq.github.io/
*   **Form:** A secure contact form is available directly on the homepage for all project inquiries.
*   **Project Types Handled:** New Websites, Website Redesigns, E-Commerce, Custom Web Apps.
